title: Market upheavals drive biggest gains since 2008 for macro hedge funds
description: Swings in the dollar, gold and government debt have been fertile territory for funds such as Kirkoswald, Rokos and Caxton
content: Swings in the dollar, gold and government debt have been fertile territory for funds such as Kirkoswald, Rokos and Caxton
